Text: List of Olympic Games host cities:  In addition, three summer and two winter editions of the Games were scheduled to take place but later cancelled due to war: Berlin (summer) in 1916; Tokyo/Helsinki (summer) and Sapporo/Garmisch-Partenkirchen (winter) in 1940; and London (summer) and Cortina d'Ampezzo, Italy (winter) in 1944.

Text: List of Olympic Games host cities:  The 1906 Summer Olympics were officially sanctioned and held in Athens.

Text: List of Olympic Games host cities:  However, in 1949, the International Olympic Committee (IOC), decided to unrecognize the 1906 Games.

Text: List of Olympic Games host cities:  Five cities have been chosen by the IOC to host upcoming Olympic Games: Pyeongchang for the 2018 Winter Olympics, Tokyo for the 2020 Summer Olympics, Beijing for the 2022 Winter Olympics, Paris for the 2024 Summer Olympics, and Los Angeles for the 2028 Summer Olympics.
